reviewText: Have been showing this movie for 20 years to my 3rd graders to go along with our study of Navajo Indians. I decided to upgrade from my old VHS to DVD! Still great.

I first saw this film about 20 years ago...got it from the library...showed some of the older adults I was working with at that time and it was healing and a very positive message about aging and dying. I strongly recommend this one!
Best,
Melissa
